index.md.Il est également important d'aborder le: It is also important to address the case of the presence of the OpenZwave plugin in parallel with the Z-Wave JS plugin, the time to switch from one to the other for example *(See paragraph
index.md.Tout d'abord, il faut savoir qu'il n'exi: First of all, you should know that there is absolutely no risk in using the Z-Wave JS and OpenZwave plugins in parallel
index.md.Même en cas de difficulté avec le plugin: Even in case of difficulty with the Z-Wave JS plugin, it will suffice to stop its daemon and restart that of the OpenZwave plugin to find an exactly identical and functional Z-Wave network
index.md.Il faut donc arrêter la gestion automati: It is therefore necessary to stop the automatic management then stop the OpenZwave plugin daemon to be able to start the Z-Wave JS plugin daemon. Again, if not, a message will warn you, preventing the start of the Z-Wave JS daemon
index.md.Ne supprimez aucun équipement du plugin: Do not delete any equipment from the OpenZwave plugin prematurely even if it is disabled during testing
index.md.Sauf message contraire, le démon Z-Wave: Unless otherwise instructed, the Z-Wave JS daemon can now be started
index.md.Sinon, un message doit s'afficher sur la: Otherwise, a message should appear on the plugin configuration page to identify the reason for the blockage
index.md.Si vous utilisez le plugin Z-Wave JS ave: If you use the Z-Wave JS plugin with a blank controller, the Z-Wave network is immediately started and available, ready for module inclusions
index.md.Dans le cas d'une utilisation avec un co: In the case of use with a controller already included in a Z-Wave network, the plugin must be left to work, which will automatically upload the equipment in Jeedom as the modules are interviewed
index.md.La première découverte totale d'un résea: The first total discovery of a Z-Wave network is therefore likely to take a long time depending on the type of modules used and their communication frequency
index.md.Les modules font leur apparition en deux: The modules appear in two stages
index.md.Tout d'abord avec leur `node id` sans im: First with their `node id` without image and without identification
index.md.Ils sont ensuite identifiés dans un seco: They are then identified in a second time
index.md.Une fois que tous les modules sur secteu: Once all the modules on mains are initiated and therefore identified, it is important to wake up the modules on batteries or wait for them to wake up
index.md.Ce n'est qu'à partir de ce moment que l': It is only from this moment that we can consider the network as being fully started
index.md.Contrairement au plugin OpenZwave, après: Unlike the OpenZwave plugin, after this first interview phase, network restarts are instantaneous thereafter
index.md.Contrairement au plugin Openzwave, il n': Unlike the Openzwave plugin, there is no dedicated section for configuring modules
index.md.En effet la configuration d'un module es: Indeed the configuration of a module is made through the command class Configuration
index.md.Celle-ci est donc visible parmis les aut: This is therefore visible among the other class commands of the module in

index.md.Permet d'exécuter des actions techniques: Allows performing technical actions on a node

index.md.comme son nom l'indique, il permet de vo: as its name suggests, it allows you to see the communication statistics of the module
index.md.regroupe toutes les informations précéde: gathers all the previous information in the form of a technical json
index.md.Ce bouton présent sur la page d'un équip: This button on the equipment page allows you to obtain the list of all the Z-Wave class commands managed by the module
index.md.Chacune peut être dépliée en cliquant de: Each can be unfolded by clicking on it to see all the controls
index.md.De nombreuses possibilités sont offferte: Many possibilities are offered by this window

index.md.Pour le moment les inclusions S2 ne sont: For the moment S2 inclusions are not possible directly from the plugin
index.md.Cette fonctionnalité sera implémentée da: This feature will be implemented in a future update, the plugin engine being already well S2 compatible
index.md.Rappelons-le, en Z-Wave, tous les module: Remember, in Z-Wave, all the modules that make up the network are directly associated with the controller
index.md.permettent même d'inclure des modules sa: even allow you to include modules without being plugged into a box
index.md.va alors permettre de créer automatiquem: will then make it possible to automatically create in Jeedom the equipment identified by the controller

index.md.Avant d'envisager de basculer définitive: Before considering switching permanently from the OpenZwave plugin to the Z-Wave JS plugin, it is essential to ensure that all the network modules are fully supported
index.md.Cette étape peut facilement prendre plus: This step can easily take several days to validate all the possibilities and scenarios
